def transform(sequence):
    first_num = sequence.find(next(filter(str.isdigit,sequence)))
    last_num = len(sequence) - sequence[::-1].find(next(filter(str.isdigit,sequence[::-1]))) - 1
    return sequence[:first_num] + sequence[last_num:] + sequence[first_num:last_num]

def transform(sequence):
    first_num = sequence.find(next(filter(str.isdigit,sequence)))
    last_num = len(sequence) - sequence[::-1].find(next(filter(str.isdigit,sequence[::-1]))) - 1
    return sequence[:first_num] + sequence[last_num:] + sequence[first_num:last_num]
